Title: Relates to reciprocity between the state and counties for businesses that are certified as minority and women-owned business enterprises
Summary: Authorizes the director of the division of minority and women's business development and the county executive of counties to enter into a memorandum of understanding to allow reciprocity between the state and such county for businesses that are certified as minority and women-owned business enterprises.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to reciprocal minority and women-owned business enterprise certification
